snippet: The high-design audience at the first show of Kraftwerk’s eight-night retrospective at the Museum of Modern Art was rewarded with an equally aesthetically tuned concert.
abstract: Pioneering electronica band Kraftwerk plays the first of eight concerts as part of a retrospective at the Museum of Modern Art; fans went to great lengths to secure tickets as fewer than 450 were sold for each show.
lead_paragraph: The high-design audience at the first show of Kraftwerk’s eight-night retrospective at the Museum of Modern Art was rewarded with an equally aesthetically tuned concert.

headline.seo: At MoMA, Kraftwerk Played to a Crowd Well Primed
headline.main: High-Design Fans Come Primed for a Retro Future
headline.print_headline: Kraftwerk Keeps Catching Up With Its Past: High-Design Fans Come Primed for a Retro Future
